Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.persistence

Class MockReader

java.lang.Object
java.io.Reader
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.persistence.MockReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable, Readable
public class MockReader extends Reader
Test stub of a Reader that takes a files and reads from it. It wraps a StringReader.

  • Field Details

      private final StringReader reader

  • Constructor Details

    • MockReader

      public MockReader(File file, Predicate<File> check, String contents)
      Creates a new instance that will simulate reading from the given file the given string. The passed file can be tested with the given predicate (useful for injecting checks into classes in testing).
      Parameters:
      file - the file to read from
      check - the check to do on the given file
      contents - the contents that the file should have
